sources.title: Julius Sizzer
sources.description: In this RKO Path√© Pictures comedy short Benny Rubin plays a dual role of "Little Sizzer" and his brother "JULIUS SIZZER" dodges gangsters trying to take him for a ride and put him on the spot. Will both brothers survive the movie, or will dreadful puns destroy their careers before the end of the movie?

metadata.Plot: A nice young Jewish boy is mistaken for a notorious gangster.
metadata.Actors: Benny Rubin, Gwen Lee, Lena Malena
